long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension "Github Labels for JIRA Sprints" allows you to display Github labels on tickets in the Active Sprints view on Jira. However, when a sprint contains many tickets it can be difficult to immediately find the tickets you are looking for.

This extension allows you to only display a subset of tickets that contain the filtered keyword by hiding the tickets that don't contain the filter query.

Boost your productivity by quickly finding the tickets that you are looking for.
